lyrics.text:
Once in royal David's city stood a lowly cattle shed, where a mother laid her baby
in a manger for his bed; Mary, loving mother mild, Jesus Christ, her little child.

He came down to earth from heaven who is God and Lord of all, and his shelter was a stable,
and his cradle was a stall. With the poor, the scorned, the lowly lived on earth our Savior holy.
